00010 Text::Text () : content(string("")), styles(vector<Style>(0)), proportionality(PROPORTIONAL), wordRates(vector<WordRate>(0))
00011 {
00012     // Build the appearance rate of every word in text
00013     computeWordRates();

00023 Text::Text (string content_) : content(content_), proportionality(PROPORTIONAL), wordRates(vector<WordRate>(0))
00024 {
00025     // Initialize the vector of styles according to the number of characters in the content
00026     styles = vector<Style>(content_.length());
00027     
00028     // Build the appearance rate of every word in text
00029     computeWordRates();
00030 };

00070 void Text::addCharacter (char character, Style style_, unsigned int position_)
00071 {
00072     // The desired position exceeds the content length, so we append to the of the text
00073     if(position_ > getLength())
00074     {
00075         this->content += character;
00076         this->styles.push_back(style_);
00077     }
00078     else
00079     {
00080         // Check for a valid position, though a compiler should use a big value when a negative
00081         // number is assigned to an unsigned int
00082         if (position_ < 0)
00083         {
00084             position_ = 0;
00085         }
00086                 
00087         // Declare two iterators for pointing to the desired position
00088         string::iterator contentIterator        = this->content.begin();
00089         vector<Style>::iterator stylesIterator  = this->styles.begin();
00090         
00091         // Advance the iterators until the desired position
00092         while (position_ > 1)
00093         {
00094             ++contentIterator;
00095             ++stylesIterator;
00096 
00097             --position_;
00098         }
00099         
00100         // Insert the character and its style
00101         this->content.insert(contentIterator, character);
00102         this->styles.insert(stylesIterator, style_);
00103     }
00104     
00105     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00106     computeWordRates();
00107 };

00118 void Text::addCharacter (char character, unsigned int position_)
00119 {
00120     // Check for a valid position
00121     if (position_ < 0)
00122     {
00123         position_ = 0;
00124     }
00125     
00126     // Call the generic 'addCharacter' function
00127     addCharacter(character, Style(), position_);
00128 }

00166 void Text::removeCharacter (unsigned int position_)
00167 {
00168     // Check for a valid position
00169     if (position_ > getLength())
00170     {
00171         position_ = getLength();
00172     }
00173     
00174     // Declare two iterators for pointing to the desired character and its style
00175     string::iterator contentIterator        = this->content.begin();
00176     vector<Style>::iterator stylesIterator  = this->styles.begin();
00177     
00178     // Advance the iterators until the desired position
00179     while (position_ > 1)
00180     {
00181         ++contentIterator;
00182         ++stylesIterator;
00183         
00184         --position_;
00185     }
00186     
00187     // Remove the character and its style
00188     this->content.erase(contentIterator);
00189     this->styles.erase(stylesIterator);
00190     
00191     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00192     computeWordRates();
00193 };

00206 Style Text::getCharacterStyle (unsigned int position_) const
00207 {
00208     if (position_ >= getLength())
00209     {
00210         return Style();
00211     }
00212     else
00213     {
00214         return this->styles[position_];
00215     }
00216 };

00228 void Text::setCharacterStyle (unsigned int position_, Style style_)
00229 {
00230     if (position_ < getLength())
00231     {
00232         this->styles[position_] = style_;
00233     }
00234 };

00337 void Text::updateWordRate (string word_)
00338 {
00339     // Searches the word in the vector
00340     vector<WordRate>::iterator wordRates;
00341     for (wordRates = this->wordRates.begin(); wordRates != this->wordRates.end(); ++wordRates)
00342     {
00343         // Updates its appearance rate
00344         if ( (*wordRates).first == word_ )
00345         {
00346             (*wordRates).second++;
00347             return;
00348         }
00349     }
00350     
00351     // The word was not stored, so here we adds its first appearance
00352     this->wordRates.push_back(WordRate(word_, 1));
00353 };
00354 
00355 
00364 void Text::computeWordRates ()
00365 {   
00366     vector<string> words;   // Vector to hold our words after removing spaces
00367     
00368     // Extract the words in text
00369     tokenize(words);
00370     
00371     // Update appearance rate of every word extracted
00372     vector<string>::iterator wordsIterator;
00373     for (wordsIterator = words.begin(); wordsIterator != words.end(); ++wordsIterator)
00374     {
00375         updateWordRate(*wordsIterator);
00376     }
00377         
00378     // This sorting will improve future lookups
00379     sort (this->wordRates.begin(), this->wordRates.end());
00380 };
00381 
00382 
00387 void Text::tokenize(vector<string>& tokens_, const string& delimiters_) const
00388 {
00389     // Skip delimiters at the beginning of text
00390     string::size_type lastPos = this->content.find_first_not_of(delimiters_, 0);
00391     
00392     // Find the first "non-delimiter"
00393     string::size_type pos     = this->content.find_first_of(delimiters_, lastPos);
00394     
00395     // Traverse the content until reaching its end
00396     while (string::npos != pos || string::npos != lastPos)
00397     {
00398         // A word has been found, add it to the vector
00399         tokens_.push_back(this->content.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos));
00400         
00401         // Skip delimiters again
00402         lastPos = this->content.find_first_not_of(delimiters_, pos);
00403         
00404         // Find the next "non-delimiter"
00405         pos = this->content.find_first_of(delimiters_, lastPos);
00406     }
00407 };
